testcase.classname: User can navigate to different pages
testcase.name: Open Book Depository Home page for guest user
testcase.system-out: Given I am an anonymous customer with clear cookies.........................passed And I open the "https://www.bookdepository.com/"............................passed Then I am redirected to a "Home page".......................................passed

testcase.classname: User can navigate to different pages
testcase.name: Open Facebook Login page
testcase.system-out: Given I am an anonymous customer with clear cookies.........................passed And I open the "https://www.facebook.com/"..................................passed Then I am redirected to a "Login page"......................................passed

testcase.classname: User can navigate to different pages
testcase.name: Open Book Depository Search page
testcase.system-out: Given I am an anonymous customer with clear cookies.........................passed And I open the "https://www.bookdepository.com/search?searchTerm=&search=Find+book".passed Then I am redirected to a "Search page".....................................passed
